headline: Northrop Secures a Contract to Boost US' Underwater Capabilities
summary: NOC is set to offer technical engineering support for the Trident II deployed ballistic missile submarines and the guided missile submarines attack weapon system.

headline: Northrop Grumman Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Nov. 20, 2024 -- The board of directors of Northrop Grumman Corporation declared a quarterly dividend of $2.06 per share on Northrop Grumman common stock, payable December 18,...

headline: LMT Secures a Contract to Support MK-41 Vertical Launch System
summary: Lockheed Martin secures a contract to provide logistics, repair and spare support for 161 MK-41 VLS components.
